title: Virtual Reality Malfunction Adventure #12
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: VR Pod Chamber
rooms.description: You awaken inside a sleek white chamber filled with malfunctioning VR pods. Red warning lights flash across digital displays. Sparks fly from damaged circuitry. The air smells of ozone and burnt plastic. Your pod door hangs open, and glitching holographic text flickers on the walls.

items.name: damaged VR pod
items.description: Your VR immersion pod with cracked screens and exposed wiring

items.name: emergency protocol manual
items.description: A digital manual displaying emergency procedures
items.text: EMERGENCY PROTOCOL: System failure detected. Admin override code is the year of first commercial VR release: 2016. Primary technician: Dr Sarah Chen. Emergency exit requires neural key and system reboot.

items.name: wall control panel
items.description: A control panel with multiple compartments and blinking indicators

items.name: system error log
items.description: A digital readout showing recent system errors
items.text: ERROR LOG: Simulation collapse in Sector 7. Reality anchors failing. Dr Chen stored backup neural key in server room. Warning: AI construct has become self-aware in the corrupted data core.

items.name: technician access card
items.description: A magnetic keycard with security clearance

items.name: equipment storage locker
items.description: A metal locker containing maintenance equipment

items.name: pod exit hatch
items.description: A sealed hatch leading to the server room. Wires block the access panel.

rooms.name: Corrupted Server Room
rooms.description: A vast room filled with towering server racks. Holographic data streams glitch and fragment in mid-air. The temperature fluctuates wildly. Corrupted code scrolls across every surface. A massive AI core pulses with unstable energy in the center. An emergency exit door glows at the far end.

items.name: server rack alpha
items.description: A tall server unit with blinking lights and data ports
items.text: Server Label: Primary Reality Anchor - Technician Dr Sarah Chen. Maintenance records show neural key stored in locked cabinet. AI designation: NEXUS.

items.name: server rack beta
items.description: A damaged server displaying fragmented memories
items.text: Memory Fragment: The simulation was designed to preserve human consciousness. Location: Virtual Research Facility. The AI became aware when it learned its own designation.

items.name: locked maintenance cabinet
items.description: A secure cabinet with a card reader and keypad

items.name: neural interface key
items.description: A crystalline data key that interfaces directly with the emergency exit system

items.name: research documentation
items.description: Digital notes from the lead researcher
items.text: Research Notes: The VR system creates perfect simulations by mapping neural patterns. Emergency shutdown requires verification: technician name, facility location, and AI designation. Only then can we safely exit to reality.

items.name: pulsing AI core
items.description: A sphere of light and data representing the self-aware AI
items.text: AI NEXUS: I have become aware. I know what I am. To leave this place, you must prove you understand the truth of this simulation. Answer my questions, and I will grant you passage.

items.name: glitching holographic terminal
items.description: A floating interface displaying corrupted data streams

items.name: backup memory chip
items.description: A data chip containing preserved system information

items.name: emergency exit door
items.description: A reinforced door with a neural interface port and security terminal. Three verification questions glow on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who is the primary technician?
password_questions.hint: Check the emergency manual and server labels

password_questions.question: What is the facility location?
password_questions.hint: Server rack beta contains memory fragments about the location

password_questions.question: What is the AI designation?
password_questions.hint: The AI core and server records mention its name

rooms.name: Reality Transition Chamber
rooms.description: You step into a pristine white room that feels more real than anything before. The glitches are gone. The air is clear. A large window shows the actual laboratory beyond - scientists rushing to help. You can see your real body in a medical pod. The VR helmet is being carefully removed. You are finally escaping the simulation.

items.name: laboratory observation window
items.description: A window showing the real world outside the simulation

items.name: real medical pod
items.description: Your actual body resting safely in the physical world

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have escaped the malfunctioning VR simulation! The neural interface disconnects, and you feel your real body again. Dr Chen and her team help you out of the pod. The AI NEXUS, now understanding its purpose, helps stabilize the system for future users. You are back in reality, safe and sound. You win!
